channel.title: CVE Feed for vue -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vue -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6783|2024-07-23T16:19:34.302Z -- vue -- vue
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Vue, that allows an attacker to perform XSS via prototype pollution. The attacker could change the prototype chain of some properties such as `Object.prototype.staticClass` or `Object.prototype.staticStyle` to execute arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2024-6783|2024-07-23T15:05:57.752Z -- vue -- vue
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Vue, that allows an attacker to perform XSS via prototype pollution. The attacker could change the prototype chain of some properties such as `Object.prototype.staticClass` or `Object.prototype.staticStyle` to execute arbitrary JavaScript code.
